resources.string: This app imports donderdagse-week files into your calendar.
Events will be created in \"%1$s\". If you want to change that, please reset your choice and pick another calendar.
Please choose a calendar to import into:
It appears you don\'t have any calendar available, please create one first.
Sorry, we cannot read or write your calendars without permission.
Please allow access through the app info screen
We\'ll use proper permission API to request permissions at runtime in the future, but this is our first Android app, so please bear with us.
